messages.zh: 第十五关（后）
messages.en: level 15(post)
……Hah.

messages.zh: 是米莎小姐吗？
messages.en: Is it Miss Misha?
……Huh?

messages.zh: 抱歉，米莎小姐，希望没有吓到你......
messages.en: Sorry, Miss Misha, I hope I didn’t startle you……

messages.zh: 罗德岛不想和你发生冲突。
messages.en: Rhodes Island doesn’t want conflict with you.

messages.zh: 我们的任务是确认你的安全，并对你施加保护。
messages.en: Our mission is to confirm your conditions, and give you protection.

messages.zh: 不就是把我抓住关起来吗？！
messages.en: You mean locking me up by that?!

messages.zh: 走开！我的爪子很锋利的......！不想受伤的话......
messages.en: Go away! My claws are sharp……! If you don’t want to get hurt……
……Pfft.
You——?

messages.zh: 如果我真的想抓你，你是没机会反抗的。
messages.en: If I really want to hurt you, you won’t have the chance to fight back.

messages.zh: 米莎小姐......我们是想帮助你，所以才......
messages.en: Miss Misha……we really want to help you, that’s why……

messages.zh: 我不相信你......龙门对待感染者比对待罪犯还严苛！
messages.en: I don’t believe you……Lungmen is harsher to the Infected than criminals!

messages.zh: 你凭什么帮助感染者？
messages.en: Why would you help an Infected?

messages.zh: 你在——干什么？
messages.en: What——are you doing?

messages.zh: 别害怕。至少让你理解......
messages.en: Don’t be scared. At least this will let you understand……
……You……
……Your hand……

messages.zh: 你也是......感染者？
messages.en: You are……an Infected too?

messages.zh: 是的，我和你一样。
messages.en: Yes, I am the same as you.

messages.zh: 龙门贫民窟藏匿着许多感染者......
messages.en: The slum of Lungmen hides many Infected……

messages.zh: 刚才的孩子们......她们很信任你。
messages.en: The children before……they really trust you.

messages.zh: 米莎小姐，你已经让他们陷入了危险。
messages.en: Miss Misha, you are already putting them in danger.

messages.zh: ......你用孩子们威胁我？！
messages.en: ……You threaten me with the children?

messages.zh: 不，我不会。但已经有人这么做了......
messages.en: No, I won’t. But there are people doing that already……

messages.zh: 罗德岛刚刚赶走过一批胁迫孩子们的人。
messages.en: Rhodes Island just drove away a gang threatening the children.

messages.zh: 保护孩子们最好的办法，就是请你跟我们走。
messages.en: The best way to protect the children, is to come with us.

messages.zh: 一方面，我们罗德岛会通过你把暴徒从孩子们身边引开——
messages.en: On one hand, Rhodes Island will lead the mobs away from the children with you——

messages.zh: 另一方面，我们会保护你不受伤害。
messages.en: On the other, we will protect you from harm.

messages.zh: ......你知道他们为什么抓我？你们......又为什么要保护我？
messages.en: ……Do you know why they’re after me? Why……are you protecting me?

messages.zh: 比起保护你的理由——我更在乎无辜感染者的安全。
messages.en: Compared with the reason for this——I care more about the safety of innocent Infected.

messages.zh: 包括你的。
messages.en: Including yours.

messages.zh: 请先允许我们带你离开这里，好吗？
messages.en: Please allow us to take you out of here for now, alright?
……Let’s go.
